summary:
A city is a large human settlement with a dense population. It's a place where people mostly work in non-farming jobs. Cities have systems for housing, transport, and services. They help people interact and get things done efficiently.

Recently, more people live in cities than ever before. This urbanization has big effects on the world. Cities connect globally, affecting issues like climate change and health. The UN is working to make cities sustainable to protect the environment.  While cities can be efficient, they also face problems like pollution and resource shortages.
title: City
